evolution_stages.conversation_summary: Problems discussed: 1) Anxiety during presentation Q&A sessions, 2) Discomfort at networking events. Solutions offered/accepted: 1) "Parking lot" response for tough questions and practicing likely Q&A, 2) 3-2-1 approach for networking (3 questions, 2 personal points, 1 goal). Student's response to solutions: Positive engagement, willingness to roleplay, and expressed feeling more natural during practice. Evidence of progress/improvement: Successfully roleplayed a networking introduction, demonstrated structured thinking for Q&A, and reported reduced pressure.

evolution_stages.conversation_summary: Problems discussed: 1) Anxiety about presentation Q&A sessions, 2) Discomfort with networking events, 3) Awkward conversation exits. Solutions offered/accepted: 1) 'Parking lot' responses for tough questions, 2) 3-2-1 networking approach, 3) Natural exit strategies. Student's response: Positively engaged with all solutions, practiced techniques in roleplay. Evidence of progress: Demonstrated improved conversation flow in practice, expressed confidence in applying techniques at upcoming events.
